question: Alexei Leonov, who passed away recently, was the legendary  cosmonaut of which country?
explanation: Alexei Leonov (85), the legendary  Soviet Russian cosmonaut, has passed away in Moscow on October 11, 2019. On 18th March 1965, he created history by becoming the first human to conduct a spacewalk for 12 minutes and 9 seconds during the Voskhod 2 mission.
